DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to verify any existing relationship between mixed oxygen saturation (from central venous catheter) and urinary sodium, potassium, chloride in determining the volemic state and renal perfusion of patients undergoing major surgical interventions.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Hemodynamics and Amount of Blood Flowing Through the Kidneys by Measuring Some Physiological Substances in Blood and Urines
DOC.criteria: thoracicabdominal major surgical operations placing of a central venous catheter and urinary catheter age 1875 ASA class IIII age above 75 or under 18 ASA class IV trauma, sepsis and/or heartlung failure liver transplantation kidney transplantation preexisting renal failure pregnant patients patients unable to give their written consent
